questions.question: If you increase the quantum number n, what happens to the number of nodes in the wavefunction?

answers.b: The number of nodes remains the same
answers.d: The number of nodes becomes zero

questions.question: What is the effect of changing the amplitude A on the wavefunction?

answers.a: It changes the frequency of the wavefunction
answers.b: It changes the shape of the wavefunction
answers.c: It changes the height of the wavefunction but not its shape
answers.d: It changes the time interval of the simulation
